text: Kudos to the staff for their best effort in arranging the classes. Thank you to all the music teachers who are patient and passionate about teaching music to children. Highly recommended!
Our son Jayden learning piano from basic there since last year. Fees are affordable and reasonable. Teachers are friendly and professional. Admin staff are also helpful and efficient.
When I when there for trial, teacher Monica is very friendly and patient with students.the staff was really kind and friendly too

Yen Her is a dedicated music educator. She has taught my son piano for 6 months and he is already able to read notes and play confidently. Yen Her is pleasant and patient, makes my child comfortable during lessons. She allow her students to perform recitals so as to gain confidence in performing in front of live audience. 100% recommended!

My girl has been attending the piano lesson with Ossia Music School at Tampines for 2 years. We love the school and its staff. Ken is very friendly and helpful and her teacher, Stephanie, is very patient and can provide very good guidance to my girl. My girl loves her teacher a lot.
